summary.para: The AnalyzeContainerType method analyzes the specified file data to determine whether it is a known font container format (e.g., WOFF or WOFF2).

param.name: fileData
param.para: Pointer to the file data to analyze.

param.name: fileDataSize
param.para: Size of the buffer passed in fileData.

returns.para: Returns the container type if recognized. DWRITE_CONTAINER_TYPE_UNKOWNN is returned for all other files, including uncompressed font files.

summary.para: Creates an empty font set builder to add font face references and create a custom font set.

param.name: fontSetBuilder
param.para: Holds the newly created font set builder object, or NULL in case of failure.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IDWriteFactory5.CreateHttpFontFileLoader

summary.para: Creates a remote font file loader that can create font file references from HTTP or HTTPS URLs. The caller is responsible for registering and unregistering the loader.

param.name: referrerUrl
param.para: Optional referrer URL for HTTP requests.

param.name: extraHeaders
param.para: Optional additional header fields to include in HTTP requests. Each header field consists of a name followed by a colon (":") and the field value, as specified by RFC 2616. Multiple header fields may be separated by newlines.

param.name: newLoader
param.para: Receives a pointer to the newly-created loader object.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.seealso: Creating a custom font set using known, remote fonts on the Web

member.name: IDWriteFactory5.CreateInMemoryFontFileLoader

summary.para: Creates a loader object that can be used to create font file references to in-memory fonts. The caller is responsible for registering and unregistering the loader.

param.name: newLoader
param.para: Receives a pointer to the newly-created loader object.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.seealso: Creating a custom font set using font data loaded into memory

summary.para: The UnpackFontFile method unpacks font data from a container file (WOFF or WOFF2) and returns the unpacked font data in the form of a font file stream.

param.name: fileDataSize
param.para: Size of the compressed data, in bytes.

param.name: unpackedFontStream
param.para: Receives a pointer to a newly created font file stream containing the uncompressed data.

returns.para: Standard HRESULT error code. The return value is E_INVALIDARG if the container type is DWRITE_CONTAINER_TYPE_UNKNOWN.

summary.para: The root factory interface for all DirectWrite objects.
